questions.explanation: △ P Q R \triangle P Q R △ PQR হতে পাই P Q → + Q R → = P R → ⇒ Q R → = P R → − P Q → \begin{aligned} & \overrightarrow{P Q}+\overrightarrow{Q R}=\overrightarrow{P R} \\ \Rightarrow & \overrightarrow{Q R}=\overrightarrow{P R}-\overrightarrow{P Q} \end{aligned} ⇒ ​ PQ ​ + QR ​ = PR QR ​ = PR − PQ ​ ​ △ P M N \triangle P M N △ PMN হতে পাই M N → = P N → − P M → \overrightarrow{M N}=\overrightarrow{P N}-\overrightarrow{P M} MN = PN − PM P M → + M N → = P N → ↑ ⇒ 1 2 P Q → + M N → = 1 2 P R → ⇒ M N → = 1 2 P R → − 1 2 P Q → ⇒ M N → = 1 2 Q R → ⇒ P N → − P M → = 1 2 Q R → ∴ Q R → = 2 ( P N → − P M → ) \begin{aligned} & \overrightarrow{P M}+\overrightarrow{M N}=\overrightarrow{P N} \uparrow \\ \Rightarrow & \frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{P Q}+\overrightarrow{M N}=\frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{P R} \\ \Rightarrow & \overrightarrow{M N}=\frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{P R}-\frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{P Q} \\ \Rightarrow & \overrightarrow{M N}=\frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{Q R} \\ \Rightarrow & \overrightarrow{P N}-\overrightarrow{P M}=\frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{Q R} \\ \therefore & \overrightarrow{Q R}=2(\overrightarrow{P N}-\overrightarrow{P M}) \end{aligned} ⇒ ⇒ ⇒ ⇒ ∴ ​ PM + MN = PN ↑ 2 1 ​ PQ ​ + MN = 2 1 ​ PR MN = 2 1 ​ PR − 2 1 ​ PQ ​ MN = 2 1 ​ QR ​ PN − PM = 2 1 ​ QR ​ QR ​ = 2 ( PN − PM ) ​
